# Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview

This project is a React Native application, heavily relying on Expo for managing a salon. It utilizes Firebase for backend services, including authentication and Firestore for database management. The app is built with TypeScript and follows modern React Native development practices, including the use of hooks and functional components. The project structure includes separate directories for components, screens, and utility functions, promoting modularity and maintainability. For styling, the project employs Tailwind CSS via NativeWind, allowing for rapid UI development with utility-first CSS classes. The application is designed to be scalable and easily extensible, with a focus on providing a seamless user experience for salon management tasks such as appointment scheduling, client management, and service tracking. Project also integrates React Native Reusables library to leverage pre-built components and hooks, enhancing development efficiency and consistency across the app.

## Code Style & Quality

- Write clear, concise code without unnecessary comments
- Follow TypeScript best practices, ensuring type safety and clarity
- Always check typescript errors before finishing any code completion
